00001 #include "dsyMatrix.h"

00003 SEXP symmetricMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00004 {
00005     SEXP val = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym);
00006     if (LENGTH(val) < 2)
00007         return mkString(_("'Dim' slot has length less than two"));
00008     if (INTEGER(val)[0] != INTEGER(val)[1])
00009         return mkString(_("Matrix is not square"));
00010     if (isString(val = check_scalar_string(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_uploSym),
00011                                            "LU", "uplo"))) return val;
00012     return ScalarLogical(1);
00013 }
00014 
00015 SEXP dsyMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00016 {
00017     /* since "dsy" inherits from "symmetric", and "dMatrix", only need this:*/
00018     return dense_nonpacked_validate(obj);
00019 }
00020 
00021 double get_norm_sy(SEXP obj, const char *typstr)
00022 {
00023     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00024     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym));
00025     double *work = (double *) NULL;
00026 
00027     typnm[0] = La_norm_type(typstr);
00028     if (*typnm == 'I' || *typnm == 'O') {
00029         work = (double *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(double));
00030     }
00031     return F77_CALL(dlansy)(typnm, uplo_P(obj),
00032                             dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)),
00033                             dims, work);
00034 }
00035 
00036 SEXP dsyMatrix_norm(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00037 {
00038     return ScalarReal(get_norm_sy(obj, CHAR(asChar(type))));
00039 }

00042 SEXP dsyMatrix_rcond(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00043 {
00044     SEXP trf = dsyMatrix_trf(obj);
00045     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00046     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00047     double anorm = get_norm_sy(obj, "O");
00048     double rcond;
00049 
00050     typnm[0] = La_rcond_type(CHAR(asChar(type)));
00051     F77_CALL(dsycon)(uplo_P(trf), dims,
00052                      REAL   (GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_xSym)), dims,
00053                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_permSym)),
00054                      &anorm, &rcond,
00055                      (double *) R_alloc(2*dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00056                      (int *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(int)), &info);
00057     return ScalarReal(rcond);
00058 }
00059 
00060 SEXP dsyMatrix_solve(SEXP a)
00061 {
00062     SEXP trf = dsyMatrix_trf(a);
00063     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dsyMatrix")));
00064     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00065 
00066     slot_dup(val, trf, Matrix_uploSym);
00067     slot_dup(val, trf, Matrix_xSym);
00068     slot_dup(val, trf, Matrix_DimSym);
00069     F77_CALL(dsytri)(uplo_P(val), dims,
00070                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), dims,
00071                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_permSym)),
00072                      (double *) R_alloc((long) dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00073                      &info);
00074     UNPROTECT(1);
00075     return val;
00076 }
00077 
00078 SEXP dsyMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00079 {
00080     SEXP trf = dsyMatrix_trf(a),
00081         val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00082     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00083         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym)),
00084         info;
00085 
00086     if (*adims != *bdims || bdims[1] < 1 || *adims < 1)
00087         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00088     F77_CALL(dsytrs)(uplo_P(trf), adims, bdims + 1,
00089                      REAL(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_xSym)), adims,
00090                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(trf, Matrix_permSym)),
00091                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)),
00092                      bdims, &info);
00093     UNPROTECT(1);
00094     return val;
00095 }

00097 SEXP dsyMatrix_as_matrix(SEXP from, SEXP keep_dimnames)
00098 {
00099     int n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym))[0];
00100     SEXP val = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, n, n));
00101 
00102     make_d_matrix_symmetric(Memcpy(REAL(val),
00103                                    REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n * n),
00104                             from);
00105     if(asLogical(keep_dimnames))
00106         setAttrib(val, R_DimNamesSymbol, GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00107     UNPROTECT(1);
00108     return val;
00109 }
00110 
00111 SEXP dsyMatrix_matrix_mm(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP rtP)
00112 {
00113     SEXP val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00114     int rt = asLogical(rtP); /* if(rt), compute b %*% a,  else  a %*% b */
00115     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00116         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym)),
00117         m = bdims[0], n = bdims[1];
00118     double one = 1., zero = 0.;
00119     double *vx = REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym));
00120     double *bcp = Memcpy(Alloca(m * n, double), vx, m * n);
00121     R_CheckStack();
00122 
00123     if ((rt && n != adims[0]) || (!rt && m != adims[0]))
00124         error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00125     if (m < 1 || n < 1) {
00126 /*      error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied")); */
00127     } else
00128         F77_CALL(dsymm)(rt ? "R" :"L", uplo_P(a), &m, &n, &one,
00129                         REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), adims, bcp,
00130                         &m, &zero, vx, &m);
00131     UNPROTECT(1);
00132     return val;
00133 }
00134 
00135 SEXP dsyMatrix_trf(SEXP x)
00136 {
00137     SEXP val = get_factors(x, "BunchKaufman"),
00138         dimP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym),
00139         uploP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_uploSym);
00140     int *dims = INTEGER(dimP), *perm, info;
00141     int lwork = -1, n = dims[0];
00142     const char *uplo = CHAR(STRING_ELT(uploP, 0));
00143     double tmp, *vx, *work;
00144 
00145     if (val != R_NilValue) return val;
00146     dims = INTEGER(dimP);
00147     val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("BunchKaufman")));
00148     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uploP));
00149     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("N"));
00150     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00151     vx = REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, n * n));
00152     AZERO(vx, n * n);
00153     F77_CALL(dlacpy)(uplo, &n, &n, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), &n, vx, &n);
00154     perm = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, n));
00155     F77_CALL(dsytrf)(uplo, &n, vx, &n, perm, &tmp, &lwork, &info);
00156     lwork = (int) tmp;
00157     work = Alloca(lwork, double);
00158     R_CheckStack();
00159     F77_CALL(dsytrf)(uplo, &n, vx, &n, perm, work, &lwork, &info);
00160     if (info) error(_("Lapack routine dsytrf returned error code %d"), info);
00161     UNPROTECT(1);
00162     return set_factors(x, val, "BunchKaufman");
00163 }
00164 
00165 SEXP dsyMatrix_as_dspMatrix(SEXP from)
00166 {
00167     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dspMatrix"))),
00168         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00169         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym);
00170     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00171 
00172     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00173     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00174     full_to_packed_double(
00175         REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, (n*(n+1))/2)),
00176         REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00177         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW, NUN);
00178     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimNamesSym,
00179              duplicate(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym)));
00180     UNPROTECT(1);
00181     return val;
00182 }
